root.title: u. bank discount borrow 310 mln dlr
root.body: u. bank discount window borrow less extend credit averag 310 mln dlr week wednesday februari 25 feder reserv say the fed say overal borrow week fell 131 mln dlr 614 mln dlr extend credit 10 mln dlr 304 mln dlr the week second half two-week statement period net borrow prior week averag 451 mln dlr comment two-week statement period end februari 25 fed say bank averag net free reserv 644 mln dlr day 1.34 billion two week earlier A feder reserv spokesman told press brief larg singl day net miss fed reserv project week wednesday He say natur float `` act bit strang time year note poor weather late week the spokesman say natur float rang 500 mln dlr friday could give reason nearli one billion dlr thursday wednesday the fed spokeman could give reason thursday high float say 750 mln dlr wednesday float figur due holdov transport float two wide separ fed district for week whole say float relat adjust `` small ad fell neg 750 mln dlr tuesday due number correct unrel cash letter error six district around countri the spokesman say tuesday wednesday two differ clear bank system problem secur feder fund wire held open 2000 2100 est day howev say problem clear afternoon evid reserv impact dure week end wednesday 45 pct net discount window borrow make small bank 30 pct 14 larg money center bank 25 pct larg region institut On wednesday 55 pct borrow account money center bank 30 pct larg region 15 pct small bank the fed spokesman say bank system excess reserv thursday monday tuesday deficit friday wedndsday that produc small daili averag deficit week whole for two-week period say rel high excess reserv daili avearg almost small bank
